import Loader from 'react-loaders' import './index.scss' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const refForm = useRef() useEffect(() => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 2500) }, []) const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs .sendForm( 'gmail', 'template_526768s', refForm.current, "Uu2o3Kl9TGdo-knIR" ) .then( () => { alert('Message sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to send the message. Please try again.') } ) } return ( <>

I would love to hear from you, especially if you are looking to get involved in a project. Please feel free to use this form to get in touch.

) } export default Contact
